{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Captain Mad Morena |image = Portrait Captain Mad Morena Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Captain Mad Morena.png |caption = |race = Dwarf |subrace = Mountain |gender = Female |culture = |background = |faction = [Principi sen Patrena](/principiSenPatrena/) |deity = |personality = |class = Rogue |level = 7 |MIG = 12 |CON = 11 |DEX = 9 |PER = 10 |INT = 10 |RES = 10 |health = 105 |damage = 18-23 {{pierce}} / 19-28 {{slash}} |accuracy = 42 / 46 |penetration = 8 / 10 |deflection = 38 |fortitude = 39 |reflex = 46 |will = 38 |dr = 7 |dr crush = 5 |dr freeze = 5 |ability = [Hale and Hardy](/haleAndHardyDeadfire/), [Sneak Attack](/sneakAttackDeadfire/), [Defensive Roll](/defensiveRoll/), [Escape](/escapeDeadfire/), [Dirty Fighting](/dirtyFightingDeadfire/), [Confounding Blind](/confoundingBlind/), [Strike the Bell](/strikeTheBell/), [Persistent Distraction](/persistentDistractionDeadfire/) |location = [Undercroft](/undercroft/) |quests = [Food for Thought](/foodForThought/)
[Goods and Services](/goodsAndServices/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = [Mad Morena's Key](/madMorenasKey/) |cape = Purple Cape |body = Exceptional Leather Armor (Deadfire){{!}}Exceptional Leather Armor |weapon1 = Fine Pistol (Deadfire){{!}}Fine Pistol |weapon1_offhand = Tarn's Respite |internalname = NPC_SD_Undercroft_Captain |guid = 10c6032b-ddf1-46b5-93f7-56a08bc69507 }} '''Captain Mad Morena''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|The captain of the Tidebreaker stands stiff-backed before you, looming despite her lack of height. Morena's features are harsh, cutting. Her hair is drawn up into a large braid on the top of her head. Feathers and bits of bone - teeth and phalanges wrapped with ribbon - jut from tresses that gleam like red wine in the low light. Her hard-muscled legs spread solidly apart, and she splays thick, calloused hands over her hips. She regards you with a heavy gaze, her chin tipped high.}} Mad Morena runs the Principi operation deep in the bowels of [Neketaka](/neketaka/), in the [Undercroft](/undercroft/). She's a crafty negotiator and a tenacious leader who has loyalty for her men - more than most captains do. Her biggest problem is keeping the entire operation far from Mataru eyes while maintaining a profit. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = [Goods and Services](/goodsAndServices/) |quests_involved = [Food for Thought](/foodForThought/) |none = |other = * Punching her in the face earns you a minor positive reputation with the Principi }} ## =Quests = * [Food for Thought](/foodForThought/): She is one of the ways into the city. * [Goods and Services](/goodsAndServices/): Either pay her 30,000 pires or deliver six crates of crude luminous adra to earn her favor. [Category:Undercroft characters](/categoryUndercroftCharacters/)

title: Captain Mad Morena
